name: Class ExecutionControl.ResolutionException
text:
An exception indicating that a DeclarationSnippet with unresolved
 references has been encountered.
 
 Contrast this with the initiating SPIResolutionException
 (a RuntimeException) which is embedded in generated corralled
 code.  Also, contrast this with
 UnresolvedReferenceException the high-level
 exception (with DeclarationSnippet reference) provided in the
 main API.
codes:
public static class ExecutionControl.ResolutionException
extends ExecutionControl.RunException

methods.description: Retrieves the internal identifier of the unresolved identifier.
